title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-1.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-1.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

In recognition of the fact that juveniles residing in

Division for Youth facilities have certain basic rights which are not lost or
made negotiable by the fact of their institutionalization, the division herein
commences listing specific inalienable rights applicable to all children in our
care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
171-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
